original: Naāsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.🔽Naāsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na āsava sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na āsava sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā  na āsava sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na āsava vippayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With-canker-related dhammas are related to with-canker-related dhammas as root-cause condition.🔽With-canker-related dhammas are related to without-canker-related dhammas as root-cause condition.

original: Naāsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto ca naāsavavippayutto ca dhammā🔽uppajjanti hetupaccayā.🔽Naāsavavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na āsava sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na āsava sampayuttaḥ ca na āsava vippayuttaḥ ca dhammā  uppajjanti hetu paccayā  na āsava vippayuttam dhammam paṭicca na āsava vippayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With-canker-related dhammas are related to with-canker-related and without-canker-related dhammas as root-cause condition.🔽Without-canker-related dhammas are related to without-canker-related dhammas as root-cause condition.

original: Naāsavavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na āsava vippayuttam dhammam paṭicca na āsava sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: Without-canker-related dhammas are related to with-canker-related dhammas as root-cause condition.

original: Naāsavavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto ca naāsavavippayutto ca dhammā🔽uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na āsava vippayuttam dhammam paṭicca na āsava sampayuttaḥ ca na āsava vippayuttaḥ ca dhammā 🔽uppajjanti hetu paccayā
translated: Without-canker-related dhammas are related to with-canker-related and without-canker-related dhammas as root-cause condition.

original: Naāsavasampayuttañca naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto dhammo🔽uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naāsavasampayuttañca naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: na āsava sampayuttañca na āsava vippayuttañca dhammam paṭicca na āsava sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ  uppajjati hetu paccayā na āsava sampayuttañca na āsava vippayuttañca dhammam paṭicca
translated: Dependent on a state that is associated with taints and also dependent on a state that is not associated with taints, a state that is not associated with taints …🔽Dependent on a state that is not associated with taints and also dependent on a state that is associated with taints, a state that is associated with taints …

original: naāsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naāsavasampayuttañca naāsavavippayuttañca🔽dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto ca naāsavavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na āsava vippayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na āsava sampayuttañca na āsava vippayuttañca  dhammam paṭicca na āsava sampayutto ca na āsava vippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā saṅkhitta
translated: Dependent on a state that is not associated with taints and also dependent on a state that is associated with taints, a state that is associated with taints and also a state that is not associated with taints …

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe cha pe vipāke ekam pe avigate nava sabbattha vitthāro
translated: (In brief:) Nine in the case of cause; six in the case of object … one in the case of kamma result … nine in the case of non-hindrance.
